name: Ultimate Front
description: In "Ultimate Front," step into the role of an archer and defend or conquer a mighty castle in a team. Battle on two unique maps against various enemies that dominate both the skies and the earth and wield magical abilities. Use your bow and unlimited arrows to defeat the foes in a breathtaking VR environment. Play with up to 4 players in VR arcades and compete with others in individually configurable leaderboards. Specifically designed for VR arcades, "Ultimate Front" utilizes the latest VR technology to offer an intense gaming experience.
